title: Senior Software Engineer
subtitle: GenAI & Platform Engineering
description: Leading GenAI adoption and cross-functional engineering initiatives
fullDescription: Unlocked $2M in revenue by co-leading crucial time-sensitive efforts and stepping in for the lead engineer. Achieved 56% reduction in expensive and time-consuming customer processes by spearheading cross-functional collaboration. Led, researched, tested, and rolled out an AI-powered merge request review agent, partnering with engineering and DevOps teams to integrate it into the CI pipeline.
achievements: Unlocked $2M in revenue through critical engineering leadership
Achieved 56% reduction in customer process time
Implemented GenAI pilot with 82% reduction in approval time and 24% reduction in cycle time
Developed services handling ~2000 requests per minute
Delivered hands-on workshops to 150+ engineers on AI agent best practices

title: Senior Consultant
subtitle: Multi-team Technical Leadership
description: Managed multi-team delivery across Java/Spring and React teams
fullDescription: Managed multi-team delivery by orchestrating Java/Spring and React teams across three client organizations, breaking down requirements into sprint-based technical plans with clear milestones. Consulted and collaborated with clients to determine project requirements, provide technical guidance, and deliver or architect solutions that met their business objectives.
achievements: Successfully managed delivery across 3 client organizations
Orchestrated Java/Spring and React development teams
Delivered sprint-based technical solutions with clear milestones
Provided strategic technical guidance to enterprise clients

title: Senior Software Engineer
subtitle: Enterprise Web Applications
description: Developed scalable web applications for major trucking company payroll systems
fullDescription: Developed and maintained scalable web applications using Java and Spring Boot framework for a major trucking company's payroll system. Mentored junior engineers, provided high-level code review, and conducted technical interviews to build strong engineering teams.
achievements: Built scalable payroll systems for major trucking company
Mentored junior engineers and conducted technical interviews
Provided high-level code review and architectural guidance

title: Software Engineer
subtitle: Full-Stack Development & Team Leadership
description: Led development on full-stack insurance claims application as tech lead
fullDescription: Led development on a full-stack web application for insurance claims as tech lead for a team of 7 engineers. Architected and led an image quality scoring system for WebRTC vehicle damage capture. Developed a Node package exposing WebRTC functions and React components, currently with ~21 downloads per month. Engineered migration of legacy system to modern email service and led GraphQL implementation.
achievements: Tech lead for team of 7 engineers on insurance claims application
Architected image quality scoring system for vehicle damage assessment
Created open-source WebRTC Node package with ongoing usage
Led legacy system migration to modern email service
Implemented GraphQL for enhanced API functionality
